column1: huge appeal for caught behind! Full and wide outside of, Salt reaches out for the drive. The umpire rules he's just hit the ground. Thunder were convinced
full at the stumps, hint of movement, takes a leading edge into the off side he aims to leg...nervy start for Salt
length ball at off stump, driven firmly to cover
full at the stumps, a slower ball, worked to the on side...excellent start from Sams

top edge to short fine leg! Excellent swirling catch by Nair. Sams was all over Salt. This was a short ball, he went for the pull, he's rushed, it went straight up in the air behind him and Nair watched it closely, he didn't look confident but did well...very tight for the no-ball but he's just okay
back of a length, nips back, takes the bottom edge into the pads and that's a wicket maiden. First maiden of the tournament
length ball at the stumps, driven to long-on
full on the pads, clipped through midwicket
that's a hefty shot! Slog sweeps a full delivery well over deep midwicket
given lbw! Great comeback from Cook, this time the sweep costs him. Pitched up fuller and quicker, Short aims to sweep and that looked pretty straight
short of a length outside off, driven to point
tucked off the pads to square leg
back of a length at off stump, 126kph, defended
fuller, at the stumps, tucked through square leg
banged in short, gets onto it with a pull which beats short fine leg. Not the best piece of fielding by Nair this time
a slower ball, full toss outside off, dips on Weatherald who pushes to the off side
short of a length outside off, drags the pull to midwicket
good length outside off, closes the face and tucks to the on side
round the wicket, driven to the covers
steps to leg and square cuts strongly through point, just a fraction short but excellent use of the crease
fuller, straight, square drives off the stumps, opens the face to get him the placement. Terrific shot, wasn't a bad ball and was very full to play that way off the back foot
thrashed through the covers! Off the front foot this time, he leans back and hammers the drive
beats him this time, pushed through a touch quicker but was short again
fuller, flicked down to long-on
over the wicket, full outside off, driven to mid-off
back of a length, straight, tucked to deep square leg
round the wicket, full outside off, pushed to the covers
fuller, driven firmly to mid-off
goes for the yorker, it's a low full toss, driven to mid-off...there's a direct hit by Green but he's safe and is alert to the overthrow
comes forward and drives to cover
over the wicket, on the pads, picks out short fine leg
steps back to leg and threads the gap beautifully between cover and mid-off, terrific placement and timing
and now he goes straight down the ground! Again moves to leg then drives through the line of a full delivery
round the wicket, change of line, full and straight, tucked through midwicket
brings out the reverse sweep to a full, straight delivery but finds backward point
worked down to long-on with a bottom-handed flick
round the wicket, starts with a bouncer outside off which Carey tries to ramp to third man but can't make contact
good length outside off, punched strongly to cover
angled in at the stumps, tucked to the left of mid-on
back over the wicket, full at the stumps, flicked to mid-on
round the wicket, length ball outside off, driven backward of square to third man
over the wicket, full outside off, driven to the covers
very full at off stump, driven to long-off
another attempt at a reverse sweep, flicked out, his carrom ball, takes the bottom edge and stops by his feet
worked off the pads into midwicket
a yorker at leg stump, dug out to the on side and Nair does well to get across
wider outside off, keeps it full, driven straight of long-off but they can't get back for the second
full, down the leg side, swept backward of square and this time they can make the second
round the wicket, worked down to long-on
connects with the reverse sweep on this occasion, gets well over the top if and picks the gap wide of backward point
digs out a very full delivery and finds cover
worked away for another single
tucked off the pads backward of square
flicks a full delivery off the stumps to long-on...fifty stand between this pair
full outside off, driven to the cover sweeper
drives a yorker hard into the pitch, bounces back to Nair who parries it away
that's a lovely shot but just a single, gives himself a touch of room and drives along the deck
keeper it full, this is outside off, driven straight down the pitch and Nair gets into a bit of a tangle with the non-striker
gets some power into this! He's able to send this straight down the ground with a very solid drive, splits the deep fielders
drags this down short, he rocks back and drives to long-off
over the wicket, full outside off, a slower ball which he plays to the on side
back of a length, straight, goes for the pull but can't make contact, takes the pads
full at off stump, flicked to long-on
a yorker at off stump, manages to work it down the ground

through him with a great slower ball! Looks like it's going to be a big full toss, dips late on Weatherald and goes under the bat. Superb bowling, his slower balls have been a standout early in the tournament
now the change up, a bouncer, he's rushed a little into the pull which finds short fine leg
flicked off the pads to deep square
goes for the sweep, gets taken on the front pad, Cook appeals for lbw but no one else interested
touch shorter, outside off, cut through point to the sweeper
through him! This slides on and beats the edge, the bounce saves him as it goes over the stumps
worked to the on side, Cook dives across and saves the single as it palms it to midwicket
driven into the covers
edged, wide of the keeper! He charged Morris, slashed at a length delivery and it flies to third man
flicks a yorker down to long-on
another yorker, can only played this back to the bowler
gives himself a touch of room to leg and drives a full delivery through the covers
a bouncer, called wide as Carey doesn't make contact with a pull
back to the full length at the stumps, driven firmly to cover and the throw results in an overthrow. No one backing up
moves to leg and uses the angle from round the wicket in his favour, whips this off the pads backward of square
full outside off, driven to long-off
played off the stumps into the off side
short outside off, steps back and cuts, brilliant piece of fielding at backward point by Khawaja
comes down the pitch and picks out cover with the drive
loses his shape as he plays a leg-side heave, gets a bottom edge towards short fine leg
cut away from outside off, that's superbly placed square through point and the sweeper can't get across
round the wicket, full at leg stump, lofted down the ground to long-on
full and straight, clears the front leg and heaves to long-on
short outside off, drops his hands and leaves it alone
opens the face and pushes through the point
great shot! A low full toss from round the wicket - not far from the yorker - he gets across and scoops it over short fine leg
a crisp lofted drive towards long-on, goes one bounce to the fielder
gets enough to clear long-off! Gave himself a little room, went up and over long-off and got just the power
in the air into the covers, not quite the same timing
short of a length outside off, square drives off the back foot to deep cover
full at off stump, clears deep midwicket with a powerful slog sweep
dragged down outside off, on the back foot, cuts through point and wide of the sweeper
guided away from off stump to short third man...an relatively expensive spell from Cook
excellent yorker at leg stump, an appeal for lbw but it's squeezed to the leg side...inside edge (and going down even if he didn't hit it)

taken at long-off! Round the wicket, it's a length ball, he's aiming straight down the ground but gets too far underneath it. Plenty of time for Green to settle himself. He's very safe. Solid innings from Carey
length ball, angled into the pads, worked backward of square. Sets off wanting two but it's not there

swiped up in the air, taken by the keeper! No fireworks from Rashid, he's gone first ball. Well bowled by Morris, banged it in short of a length, Rashid went for a leg-side swing and got a big top edge
full at leg stump, clipped towards short fine leg
full and straight, driven into the off side
full and straight, clipped through midwicket
short of a length outside off, played out to deep cover
gets this over mid-on, short outside off, drags the pull over Hales and he can't quite chase it down
back of a length, aims a cross-batted swipe to the leg side again, gets a bottom edge into his boot
just over deep square! Back of a length outside off, picked up very nicely with the pull and has enough legs to clear Sams on the rope
fuller, outside off, opens the face to backward point. Very handy innings from Wells
thick outside edge over third man, full outside off, Wells throwing his hands into the drive and it skews away
nails the drive! That's a cracking shot. Full at the stumps, couldn't have hit that drive much sweeter
change of line, round the wicket, and a wonderful piece of placement as Wells opens the face and guides it wide of backward point
good comeback, gets the yorker in at off stump, dug out back to the bowler
slower ball, full at leg stump, pushed to long-off
back over the wicket, good yorker to finish with, pushed to the covers
full and straight, moves right across the crease and flicks towards short fine leg...came off the toe end into the pitch and reached Nair on the full
wonderful stroke! Brings out the scoop as Morris goes full and straight, sends it over short fine leg to reach fifty off 28 balls
pushes this outside off, swing and miss
back of a length, wide outside off, Wells moves right across and tries the scoop but doesn't make contact...back to back dot balls
yorker at off stump, square drives to backward point...excellent stuff from Morris
full, pushed down the leg side, tries to scoop it away but gets the wide (and bye, well two wides) anyway
dug in short, he splices the ball and it falls safe into the leg side, deep square can't stop the second
round the wicket, good length outside off, driven on the up to mid-off

edged, taken at slip! White has done brilliantly with Carey diving across him. That's a massive strike early on. Very full outside off, Khawaja goes for the drive, Carey goes for it and it glances his left glove but White manages to keep his focus and grab hold, with a bit of a bobble himself. Bounced off his wrist. Blimey!
big full toss! On the hip, Ferguson does well to work that behind square
another poor ball, full on the pads, clipped wide of short fine leg...two gifts after the wicket
better delivery, full at off stump, defended to cover
back of a length at off stump, 143kph, defended to point...a mixed over, but a crucial wicket
back of a length outside off, driven square to cover
beaten and goes over the stumps, Hales giving himself room to the leg side against a back-of-a-length delivery and exposed all his stumps
worked from outside off into midwicket
full and straight, worked off the pads to deep midwicket
a strong bottom-handed clip wide of mid-on, that's one of his favoured shot, excellent placement
full outside off, stays leg side and drives on the up to point
full and straight, worked off the pads in front of square, well fielded by Weatherald...they are having a lengthy check of this, to see whether his foot is on the rope. And it's given four in the end
length ball tucked off the pads to deep square
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
drives a length ball towards mid-on, was in the air for a little while
gets too straight, neatly flicked off his pads through short fine leg
great shot! Throws his hands into a very powerful drive, too much width from Agar. Terrifically put away. Expensive start from Agar
back of a length, straight, defended to the bowler
stays leg side and slashes a length delivery outside off wide of backward point
now he's very full on the pads, clipped to deep square
short of a length outside off, he's back and across with a very correct defensive shot
full and straight, gets a leading edge as he aims to the leg side
short outside off, he pulls firmly to deep square
back of a length, straight, an appeal for lbw as he plays across the line...looked high
dragged down very short, pulled strongly backward of square
bounces down the leg side, tough for Carey
